title: Artificial intelligence helping to cut waiting times in hospital A&E departments this winter
description: Around 50 NHS organisations are using the A&E Admissions Forecasting Tool, which predicts potential upcoming surges in admissions. | ITV National News
content:
Hospitals in England are using artificial intelligence (AI) to help cut waiting times in emergency departments this winter, officials have said.
The AI tool, which was launched in 2024, provides hospitals in England with anticipated A&E admissions th... [2779 chars]

title: Eight ways AI affected pop culture in 2025
description: Artificial intelligence made a significant impact on pop culture in 2025. AI-generated music topped charts, and films used AI for accent enhancement. Classic movies were reimagined with AI, and podcast hosts cloned their voices. Deceased celebrities appeared in AI-generated videos, sparking debate. Hollywood grappled with AI's role, with some directors opposing its use.
content:

title: Will AI wipe out the working class, and recast our view of ourselves?
description: IN the United States, a group of super-billionaires, led by Elon Musk, the world’s richest human being, reportedly worth at least $700 billion, is said to be investing heavily in the rapid advancement of artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics, and predicts the end of poverty and the arrival of utopia as AI and robots take over the work of human beings and make work, as we know it, completely optional. At least 100 million of these jobs are expected to end in robots’ hands within the next 10 years, beginning with nurses, truck drivers, accountants, teaching assistants, and fast-food workers.

title: DeSantis Emerges as AI Skeptic in Clash With Trump
description: With one year left in his term, DeSantis has made regulating artificial intelligence a top priority.
content:

description: Speaking at the inauguration of Vidya Pratishthan's Sharad Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence (CoE-AI) in Baramati, Adani noted that new technologies often raise concerns about job losses, loss of relevance, and the surrendering of control to systems not yet fully understood. He emphasised that these concerns must be acknowledged and addressed responsibly.
content:
